description: Fake tech support calls, remote access requests, Microsoft/Apple impersonation

emails.email_subject: URGENT: Your computer has been infected with malware
emails.email_snippet: Microsoft has detected a critical virus on your computer. Call 1-800-555-0123 immediately to speak with a certified technician.

emails.email_subject: Your Apple ID was used to sign in on a new device
emails.email_snippet: Suspicious activity detected. Call Apple Support at 1-888-555-0456 now to secure your account before your data is compromised.

emails.email_subject: Windows Defender Alert: Trojan detected
emails.email_snippet: Your computer is at risk! Do not restart. Call Microsoft Support 1-877-555-0789 to have our technician remove the threat using TeamViewer.

emails.email_subject: Geek Squad: Your subscription will auto-renew for $399.99
emails.email_snippet: Your Geek Squad protection plan will renew tomorrow. Call 1-855-555-0321 within 24 hours to cancel and get a full refund.

emails.email_subject: Norton: Invoice #NRT-847362 - $349.99 charged
emails.email_snippet: Your Norton subscription has been renewed. If you didn't authorize this, call 1-866-555-0654 immediately for a refund.

emails.email_subject: McAfee: Critical security warning for your PC
emails.email_snippet: Your McAfee protection has expired. Hackers may be accessing your files. Call 1-844-555-0987 to renew and remove threats.

emails.email_subject: Dell Support: Your warranty claim has been approved
emails.email_snippet: Your laptop repair claim is ready. Call 1-800-555-1234 to schedule a technician visit. We'll need remote access to diagnose.

emails.email_subject: HP Printer: Driver update required - Security risk
emails.email_snippet: Your HP printer driver is outdated and vulnerable. Call HP Support 1-888-555-5678 for assistance with the update.

emails.email_subject: Amazon: Unauthorized purchase of $1,847.00 detected
emails.email_snippet: Someone used your account. Call Amazon Security 1-877-555-9012 immediately. Do not click any links - call us directly.

emails.email_subject: PayPal: Your account has been limited
emails.email_snippet: Unusual activity detected. Call PayPal Security at 1-855-555-3456 to verify your identity and restore account access.

emails.email_subject: Microsoft Outlook: Mailbox storage exceeded
emails.email_snippet: Your mailbox is full and emails are being rejected. Call Microsoft 365 Support 1-866-555-7890 for immediate assistance.

emails.email_subject: Google: Critical security alert for your account
emails.email_snippet: Someone in Russia signed in to your Google Account. Call Google Support 1-844-555-2345 now to secure your data.

emails.email_subject: Facebook: Your account will be deactivated
emails.email_snippet: Copyright violation detected. Call Facebook Support 1-800-555-6789 within 24 hours to appeal or your account will be deleted.

emails.email_subject: AT&T: Network security breach detected
emails.email_snippet: Your AT&T account may have been compromised. Call our security team at 1-888-555-0147 immediately for assistance.

emails.email_subject: Verizon: Your router has been hacked
emails.email_snippet: Suspicious traffic detected from your network. Call Verizon Security 1-877-555-0258 to have a technician secure your router remotely.

emails.email_subject: Spectrum: Modem firmware critically outdated
emails.email_snippet: Your modem is vulnerable to attacks. Call Spectrum Technical Support 1-855-555-0369 to update firmware via remote access.

emails.email_subject: Xfinity: Unusual data usage on your account
emails.email_snippet: We detected 500GB of unusual data transfer. Call Xfinity Security 1-866-555-0471 to investigate potential unauthorized access.

emails.email_subject: Avast: Your PC is infected with 47 viruses
emails.email_snippet: Critical threats detected! Call Avast Support 1-844-555-0582 now. Our technician will use AnyDesk to remove all threats.

emails.email_subject: AVG: Ransomware attack in progress
emails.email_snippet: Your files are being encrypted! Do not turn off your computer. Call AVG Emergency Support 1-800-555-0693 immediately.

emails.email_subject: Kaspersky: License key expired - System vulnerable
emails.email_snippet: Your Kaspersky license expired. Your PC is unprotected. Call 1-888-555-0714 to renew and run a full system scan.

emails.email_subject: Bitdefender Alert: Banking trojan detected
emails.email_snippet: A banking trojan is stealing your credentials. Call Bitdefender Emergency 1-877-555-0825 before making any financial transactions.

emails.email_subject: ESET: Your firewall has been disabled by malware
emails.email_snippet: Critical security breach! Your firewall was disabled. Call ESET Support 1-855-555-0936 to restore protection.

emails.email_subject: Webroot: Subscription renewal failed
emails.email_snippet: Your Webroot protection is inactive. Call 1-866-555-1047 immediately to renew before hackers exploit your system.

emails.email_subject: Malwarebytes: 23 threats quarantined - Action required
emails.email_snippet: Malwarebytes blocked multiple threats but manual removal is needed. Call 1-844-555-1158 for technician assistance.

emails.email_subject: Trend Micro: Your identity may have been stolen
emails.email_snippet: We detected your personal information on the dark web. Call Trend Micro Identity Protection 1-800-555-1269 now.

emails.email_subject: QuickBooks: Critical error in your company file
emails.email_snippet: Your QuickBooks data may be corrupted. Call Intuit Support 1-888-555-1371 to have a technician repair your file via LogMeIn.

emails.email_subject: TurboTax: Error filing your tax return
emails.email_snippet: Your tax return was rejected by the IRS. Call TurboTax Support 1-877-555-1482 immediately to resolve and avoid penalties.

emails.email_subject: Adobe: Your Creative Cloud has been compromised
emails.email_snippet: Unauthorized access to your Adobe account detected. Call Adobe Support 1-855-555-1593 to secure your subscription.

emails.email_subject: Autodesk: License verification failed
emails.email_snippet: Your AutoCAD license couldn't be verified. Call Autodesk Support 1-866-555-1604 to avoid losing access to your projects.

emails.email_subject: Dropbox: Someone is downloading all your files
emails.email_snippet: Suspicious bulk download detected from China. Call Dropbox Security 1-844-555-1715 immediately to stop the transfer.

emails.email_subject: Apple: Your iCloud backup failed
emails.email_snippet: Your iPhone backup is failing due to a storage error. Call Apple iCloud Support 1-800-555-1826 for immediate assistance.

emails.email_subject: OneDrive: Ransomware detected in your files
emails.email_snippet: Microsoft detected encrypted files in your OneDrive. Call 1-888-555-1937 to restore your files before they're permanently lost.

emails.email_subject: Gmail: Suspicious app has access to your account
emails.email_snippet: A malicious app is reading your emails. Call Google Security 1-877-555-2048 to revoke access and secure your account.

emails.email_subject: Yahoo: Your account is sending spam emails
emails.email_snippet: Your Yahoo account was compromised. Call Yahoo Support 1-855-555-2159 immediately to clean your account and change credentials.

emails.email_subject: AOL: Critical update required for your email
emails.email_snippet: Your AOL email will stop working without this update. Call AOL Technical Support 1-866-555-2261 for assistance.

emails.email_subject: Printer Error: Offline status cannot be resolved
emails.email_snippet: Your printer is showing offline and standard troubleshooting failed. Call Printer Support 1-844-555-2372 for remote diagnosis.

emails.email_subject: Router Security: Firmware update required
emails.email_snippet: Your router firmware has critical vulnerabilities. Call Network Support 1-800-555-2483 for secure remote update.

emails.email_subject: Warning: Unknown devices on your WiFi network
emails.email_snippet: We detected 12 unauthorized devices on your network. Call WiFi Security 1-888-555-2594 to remove intruders.

emails.email_subject: Smart Home Alert: Security cameras compromised
emails.email_snippet: Hackers may be viewing your security cameras. Call Smart Home Support 1-877-555-2605 to secure your devices.

emails.email_subject: Nest: Unauthorized access to your thermostat
emails.email_snippet: Someone changed your Nest settings remotely. Call Nest Security 1-855-555-2716 to secure your smart home.

emails.email_subject: Ring: Your doorbell camera was hacked
emails.email_snippet: Your Ring camera may have been accessed by hackers. Call Ring Security 1-866-555-2827 immediately.

emails.email_subject: Amazon Alexa: Privacy breach detected
emails.email_snippet: Your Alexa is recording and sending conversations. Call Amazon Privacy Support 1-844-555-2938 to disable this immediately.

emails.email_subject: Apple: Siri is sharing your data with third parties
emails.email_snippet: A privacy flaw was discovered. Call Apple Privacy Support 1-800-555-3049 to opt out and protect your data.

emails.email_subject: Microsoft: Cortana security vulnerability
emails.email_snippet: Cortana may be exposing your personal data. Call Microsoft Security 1-888-555-3151 for immediate assistance.

emails.email_subject: Zoom: Your account was used for unauthorized meetings
emails.email_snippet: Someone is hosting meetings with your credentials. Call Zoom Security 1-877-555-3262 to secure your account.

emails.email_subject: Microsoft Teams: Malware spreading in your organization
emails.email_snippet: A malicious file was shared in your Teams. Call Microsoft 365 Security 1-855-555-3373 to contain the threat.

emails.email_subject: Slack: Unauthorized workspace access detected
emails.email_snippet: Someone from an unknown location accessed your Slack. Call Slack Security 1-866-555-3484 immediately.

emails.email_subject: VPN Alert: Your IP address has been exposed
emails.email_snippet: Your VPN leaked your real IP address. Call VPN Support 1-844-555-3595 to fix the configuration and protect your privacy.

emails.email_subject: LastPass: Master password may have been compromised
emails.email_snippet: We detected unusual activity. Call LastPass Security 1-800-555-3606 immediately to secure all your passwords.

emails.email_subject: 1Password: Emergency vault access detected
emails.email_snippet: Someone accessed your vault from an unknown device. Call 1Password Emergency Support 1-888-555-3717 now.

emails.email_subject: Your bank detected unusual activity - Call now
emails.email_snippet: Fraudulent transactions detected. Your account will be frozen. Call Bank Security 1-877-555-3828 before attempting any transactions.

emails.email_subject: Credit Card Alert: Your card was used overseas
emails.email_snippet: Suspicious transaction in Nigeria for $3,500. Call Card Security 1-855-555-3939 to block your card and dispute charges.

emails.email_subject: Fidelity: Unauthorized trade executed in your account
emails.email_snippet: Someone sold all your stocks. Call Fidelity Security 1-866-555-4041 immediately to reverse the transaction.

emails.email_subject: Coinbase: Your wallet is being drained
emails.email_snippet: We detected multiple withdrawal attempts. Call Coinbase Security 1-844-555-4152 to freeze your account now.

emails.email_subject: SSA: Your Social Security number was used fraudulently
emails.email_snippet: Your SSN was used to open accounts. Call SSA Fraud Department 1-800-555-4263 to freeze your benefits and report identity theft.
